text: The Isla Suárez (Bolivia) or Ilha de Guajará-Mirim (Brazil) is one of the world's many disputed territories. The island lies in the Rio Mamoré, which defines part of the boundary between the Bolivian department of Beni and the Brazilian state of Rondônia. Category:Territorial disputes of Brazil Category:Territorial disputes of Bolivia Category:Bolivia–Brazil border Category:Disputed islands
title: Isla Suárez
